about_the_game:
Short description:
The main character is a blogger Alex. He runs his own channel and searches for paranormal trends there. Now he goes to an abandoned buildings, where were military barracks in the past, according to the official information. He takes with him all his devices: a camera and a video surveillance system.
You won’t have any doubts about the existence of the other world, after exploring this building. Make content that’ll turn you into an internet star!

Paranormal Place
is a first-person psychological thriller. The main emphasis of the game is on the process of exploration, the tension slowly builds up, creating complete and vivid immersive effect.


DESCRIPTION OF CONTENT FOR ADULTS
The developer describes the content as follows:
The game contains realistic depictions of violent scenes that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content may be inappropriate for certain age groups.

name: Paranormal place Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 или AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 или AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 или AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Alex is a blogger who explores places with paranormal phenomena. At the request of his subscribers, he goes to an abandoned place where, according to rumors, some creepy things were noticed. What is happening there? You have to find it out.
